content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I was created and received a command to google "properties of rivers". My computer returned a list of URLs related to river properties.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "how to be a river"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.nps.gov/subjects/rivers/eligibility.htm", "https://www.nationalgeographic.org/article/understanding-rivers/", "https://www.nps.gov/orgs/1912/eligible-and-suitable.htm", "https://www.usgs.gov/special-topics/water-science-school/science/rivers-streams-and-creeks", "https://tpwd.texas.gov/publications/nonpwdpubs/water_issues/rivers/navigation/kennedy/kennedy_faq.phtml", "https://www.nytimes.com/2017/03/01/magazine/sand-mining-india-how-to-steal-a-river.html", "https://www.oars.com/blog/become-river-guide/", "https://www.weather.gov/lot/hydrology_education_forecasting"]', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.nationalgeographic.org/article/understanding-rivers/", "question": "How can I be a river?"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content="Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: providing information on rivers, including their anatomy, importance, history, and environmental issues. It also discusses the benefits and negative effects of hydroelectric power, the importance of river management, and provides resources for teaching about landscapes and natural features. However, it does not provide information on how to be a river.\n\nLinks: [' (https://www.nationalgeographic.org)', 'Education (https://www.nationalgeographic.org/)', 'Donate (https://give.nationalgeographic.org/page/49060/donate/1)', ' (https://www.nationalgeographic.org/search)', ' (https://classroom.google.com/share?url=https://education.nationalgeographic.org/resource/understanding-rivers/)']", type='action_result')]
"""
